author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-693. java: Thrift compiler generated java code that throws compiler warnings about deprecated methods.
This patch removes the deprecated methods from TBase and makes some generator changes to accommodate.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "jQuery Lookup Layer Transformation" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3841) - OFBIZ-3841
Patch for fixing the positioning issue. Default: topleft!

author: fdmanana
msg: Avoid deadlock for a replication by doc IDs when the list of doc IDs passes the limits of the work queue.
